snippet: A number of firms that conduct their polls online had strong results. Some telephone polls also did well. But others, especially those that  took methodological shortcuts, performed poorly.
abstract: A number of firms that conduct their polls online had strong results. Some telephone polls also did well. But others, especially those that  took methodological shortcuts, performed poorly.

headline.main: Which Polls Fared Best (and Worst) in the 2012 Presidential Race
